alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 10:51AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sedgwick and north central Sumner Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1050 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Clearwater, moving north-northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Park City, Bel Aire, Maize, Clearwater, Conway Springs, Downtown Wichita, Eastborough, West Wichita, East Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, Northeast Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Oaklawn, Jabara Airport and Riverdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 12. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 38 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
